Yes, boss (Just a friendly name, I know your not the boss!) I know that, I
just am making sure Mirage get's his fair mention, Beast Machines are the
grandest thing there is! I got a new Beast Machines figure today, Razorclaw
the Mutant Beast War, he rocks!...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>

Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 8:26 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> The thing is that teleporting often leads to superpoweful chars that can
> never be hit (I'd know, Zardus used to have that ability, and it made him
> almost impossible to hit. Untill I got rid of it). That's why I think
> teleportation should take alot of energy, or else we'll have invincible
bots
> teleporting around the battlefield.
